name: IlloScape: Into the Illoverse
summary:
Hello!, this is my project for the "IlloJam 2024", the objective of this Jam was to make a game within a period of "1 Month" for Illojuan, so the game focuses on its lore.

It is a small "roguelite" Arcade game which begins while you are sleeping and you hear a voice telling you that Masi (your girlfriend) has disappeared, you must overcome 4 Worlds with their respective enemies and bosses to reach her.
